resources.string: Tap anywhere to get started with an efficient code tracking experience
What would you like to do today?

You can enter all the details of your coding practice session here; Time and space complexity of your solution, duration of the session, the problem description, a link to the problem, and a lot more data!
View insights compiled from all your recorded sessions.
View the data from all your previously recorded practice sessions here.
On which site did you find this problem? *
You can add a link to the problem/site here
Was the problem Easy, Medium, or Difficult? *
You can explain your solution here
What was the time complexity of your solution?
What was the space complexity of your solution?
When did you solve or attempt this problem? *
How long did this take you to solve? (In minutes) *
Please check the data entered in the required fields
All done! \n Your session data was saved successfully.
Uh Oh! \n Looks like something went wrong. Please try again later.
You haven\'t saved any session data yet.
Something\'s not right! Please try again later.
